channel.title: Blind Spots on Asymmetrical Collage
channel.description: Recent content in Blind Spots on Asymmetrical Collage

item.title: Beyond the Echo Chamber
item.description: The easiest way to feel right is to only attend events where everyone already agrees with you. I went to CryptoXR yesterdayâ€”something I normally avoid. My expectation was noise. What I found was a lot of Bitcoin signal in an unexpected place. People building real things. People asking the right questions. Just in a venue I’d written off. The market being what it is probably helped. When prices aren’t pumping, you filter out the noise naturally.
